channel.title: Brookton Resources on M. E. Mills
channel.description: Recent content in Brookton Resources on M. E. Mills

item.title: Brookton's Market 2011 Calendar
item.description: Compiled by Deborah Halpern and Kathy Keaney. Layout and design by Avi Smith. Contains many historical photographs and facts focused on Brookton’s Market, formerly Frank F. Mulks general store.

item.title: Relevant Deed Data
item.description: This section summarizes deeds collected during this research. Note that for the properties presented, the deed history should be assumed incomplete. I have followed the deed histories only as far as I am able at any given time, and because I am most interested in data of clear historical value, I have chosen in some instances to not include such things as appropriations, boundary line agreements, etc., unless they are themselves directly relevant to what is being investigated.
